title: LP system needs to change
body: Can we make the LP system so that the good players climb and arn't stuck with all the retards in bronze it would be a lot better

replies.body: That is how the system is now, so enjoy the bronze.
Current system only works in a community that has no trolling, afking or account buying/boosting.
Just as a point, if Account boosting exists, good players can get out of bronze, therefore the OP is whining for no good reason.
